00057 bool
00058 BscIsItem( SBscItemInfo* itemInfo, const SBscItem* items, unsigned int itemCount, const BscArrayTable* arrayTable,
00059                    const BscVarTable* varTable, const SBscToken* tokens, unsigned int* tokensRead )
00060 {
00062         B_ASSERT( itemInfo != 0 );
00063 
00065         itemInfo->itemIdx = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00066 
00068         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < itemCount; ++i )
00069         {
00070                 switch ( items[ i ].type )
00071                 {
00072                 case EIT_IDENT:
00073                         if ( BscIsIdent( tokens, tokensRead ) )
00074                         {
00075                                 itemInfo->type = EIT_IDENT;
00076                                 itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00077                                 itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00078                                 itemInfo->valueCount = 1;
00079                                 return true;
00080                         }
00081                         break;
00082 
00083                 case EIT_PATH:
00084                         if ( BscIsPath( tokens, tokensRead ) )
00085                         {
00086                                 itemInfo->type = EIT_PATH;
00087                                 itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00088                                 itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00089                                 itemInfo->valueCount = 1;
00090                                 return true;
00091                         }
00092                         break;
00093 
00094                 case EIT_NAMEDEXPR:
00095                         if ( BscIsNamedExpr( items[ i ].name, tokens, *arrayTable, *varTable, tokensRead ) )
00096                         {
00097                                 itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDEXPR;
00098                                 itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00099                                 itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00100                                 itemInfo->valueCount = 1;
00101                                 return true;
00102                         }
00103                         break;
00104 
00105                 case EIT_NAMEDEXPRLIST:
00106                         {
00107                                 unsigned int exprCount = BscIsNamedExprList( items[ i ].name, tokens, *arrayTable, *varTable, tokensRead );
00108                                 if ( exprCount > 0 )
00109                                 {
00110                                         itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDEXPRLIST;
00111                                         itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00112                                         itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00113                                         itemInfo->valueCount = exprCount;
00114                                         return true;
00115                                 }
00116                         }
00117                         break;
00118 
00119                 case EIT_NAMEDFLAG:
00121                         B_ASSERT( items[ i ].flagValues != 0 );
00122                         if ( BscIsNamedFlag( items[ i ].name, tokens, items[ i ].flagValues, items[ i ].flagCount, tokensRead ) )
00123                         {
00124                                 itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDFLAG;
00125                                 itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00126                                 itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00127                                 itemInfo->valueCount = 1;
00128                                 return true;
00129                         }
00130                         break;
00131 
00132                 case EIT_NAMEDFLAGLIST:
00134                         B_ASSERT( items[ i ].flagValues != 0 );
00135                         if ( BscIsNamedFlagList( items[ i ].name, tokens, items[ i ].flagValues, items[ i ].flagCount, tokensRead ) )
00136                         {
00137                                 itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDFLAGLIST;
00138                                 itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00139                                 itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00140                                 itemInfo->valueCount = 1;
00141                                 return true;
00142                         }
00143                         break;
00144 
00145                 case EIT_NAMEDIDENTEXPR:
00146                         if ( BscIsNamedIdentExpr( items[ i ].name, tokens, *arrayTable, *varTable, tokensRead ) )
00147                         {
00148                                 itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDIDENTEXPR;
00149                                 itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00150                                 itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00151                                 itemInfo->valueCount = 1;
00152                                 return true;
00153                         }
00154                         break;
00155 
00156                 case EIT_NAMEDIDENTEXPRLIST:
00157                         {
00158                                 unsigned int exprCount = BscIsNamedIdentExprList( items[ i ].name, tokens, *arrayTable, *varTable, tokensRead );
00159                                 if ( exprCount > 0 )
00160                                 {
00161                                         itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDIDENTEXPRLIST;
00162                                         itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00163                                         itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00164                                         itemInfo->valueCount = exprCount;
00165                                         return true;
00166                                 }
00167                         }
00168                         break;
00169 
00170                 case EIT_NAMEDPATH:
00171                         if ( BscIsNamedPath( items[ i ].name, tokens, tokensRead ) )
00172                         {
00173                                 itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDPATH;
00174                                 itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00175                                 itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00176                                 itemInfo->valueCount = 1;
00177                                 return true;
00178                         }
00179                         break;
00180 
00181                 case EIT_NAMEDPATHLIST:
00182                         {
00183                                 unsigned int pathCount = BscIsNamedPathList( items[ i ].name, tokens, tokensRead );
00184                                 if ( pathCount > 0 )
00185                                 {
00186                                         itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDPATHLIST;

00188                                         itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00189                                         itemInfo->valueCount = pathCount;
00190                                         return true;
00191                                 }
00192                         }
00193                         break;
00194 
00195                 case EIT_NAMEDIDENTPATH:
00196                         if ( BscIsNamedIdentPath( items[ i ].name, tokens, tokensRead ) )
00197                         {
00198                                 itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDIDENTPATH;
00199                                 itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00200                                 itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00201                                 itemInfo->valueCount = 1;
00202                                 return true;
00203                         }
00204                         break;
00205 
00206                 case EIT_NAMEDIDENTPATHFLAGLIST:
00207                         if ( BscIsNamedIdentPathFlagList( items[ i ].name, tokens, items[ i ].flagValues, items[ i ].flagCount, tokensRead ) )
00208                         {
00209                                 itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDIDENTPATHFLAGLIST;
00210                                 itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00211                                 itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00212                                 itemInfo->valueCount = 1;
00213                                 return true;
00214                         }
00215                         break;
00216 
00217                 case EIT_NAMEDIDENTPATHLIST:
00218                         {
00219                                 unsigned int pathCount = BscIsNamedIdentPathList( items[ i ].name, tokens, tokensRead );
00220                                 if ( pathCount )
00221                                 {
00222                                         itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDIDENTPATHLIST;
00223                                         itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00224                                         itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00225                                         itemInfo->valueCount = pathCount;
00226                                         return true;
00227                                 }
00228                         }
00229                         break;
00230 
00231                 case EIT_NAMEDIDENTPATHLISTFLAGLIST:
00232                         {
00233                                 unsigned int pathCount = BscIsNamedIdentPathListFlagList( items[ i ].name, tokens, items[ i ].flagValues, items[ i ].flagCount, tokensRead );
00234                                 if ( pathCount )
00235                                 {
00236                                         itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDIDENTPATHLISTFLAGLIST;
00237                                         itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00238                                         itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00239                                         itemInfo->valueCount = pathCount;
00240                                         return true;
00241                                 }
00242                         }
00243                         break;
00244 
00245                 case EIT_NAMEDIDENTPAIR:
00246                         if ( BscIsNamedIdentPair( items[ i ].name, tokens, tokensRead ) )
00247                         {
00248                                 itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDIDENTPAIR;
00249                                 itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00250                                 itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00251                                 itemInfo->valueCount = 2;
00252                                 return true;
00253                         }
00254                         break;
00255 
00256                 case EIT_NAMEDSTRING:
00257                         if ( BscIsNamedString( items[ i ].name, tokens, tokensRead ) )
00258                         {
00259                                 itemInfo->type = EIT_NAMEDSTRING;
00260                                 itemInfo->itemId = items[ i ].itemId;
00261                                 itemInfo->itemIdx = i;
00262                                 itemInfo->valueCount = 1;
00263                                 return true;
00264                         }
00265                         break;
00266 
00267                 default:
00269                         B_ASSERT( false );
00270                 }
00271         }
00272 
00273         return false;
00274 }

00276 //----------------------------------------------------------
00277 unsigned int
00278 BscParseItem( SBscItemValue* value, const SBscItemInfo* itemInfo, const SBscItem* items, unsigned int itemCount,
00279                           const BscArrayTable* arrayTable, const BscVarTable* varTable, const SBscToken* tokens )
00280 {
00281         B_ASSERT( value != 0 );
00282         B_ASSERT( itemInfo != 0 );
00283         B_ASSERT( itemInfo->itemIdx < itemCount );
00284 
00287         B_ASSERT( items[ itemInfo->itemIdx ].itemId == itemInfo->itemId );
00288         value->itemId = itemInfo->itemId;
00289 
00290         unsigned int i = itemInfo->itemIdx;
00291         switch ( items[ i ].type )
00292         {
00293         case EIT_IDENT:
00295                 B_ASSERT( value->strings == 0 );
00296 
00297                 value->idents = new tstring[ itemInfo->valueCount ];
00298                 value->identCount = itemInfo->valueCount;
00299 
00300                 return BscParseIdent( *value->strings, tokens );
00301 
00302         case EIT_PATH:
00304                 B_ASSERT( value->paths == 0 );
00305 
00306                 value->paths = new UPath[ itemInfo->valueCount ];
00307                 value->pathCount = itemInfo->valueCount;
00308 
00309                 return BscParsePath( *value->paths, tokens );
00310 
00311         case EIT_NAMEDEXPR:
00313                 B_ASSERT( value->exprs == 0 );
00314 
00315                 value->exprs = new URef< UExprTerm >[ itemInfo->valueCount ];
00316                 value->exprCount = itemInfo->valueCount;
00317 
00318                 return BscParseNamedExpr( value->exprs, items[ i ].name, tokens, *arrayTable, *varTable );
00319 
00320         case EIT_NAMEDEXPRLIST:
00322                 B_ASSERT( value->exprs == 0 );
00323 
00324                 value->exprs = new URef< UExprTerm >[ itemInfo->valueCount ];
00325                 value->exprCount = itemInfo->valueCount;
00326 
00327                 return BscParseNamedExprList( value->exprs, itemInfo->valueCount, items[ i ].name, tokens, *arrayTable, *varTable );
00328 
00329         case EIT_NAMEDFLAG:
00331                 B_ASSERT( items[ i ].flagValues != 0 );
00332 
00333                 return BscParseNamedFlag( value->flagValues, items[ i ].name, tokens, items[ i ].flagValues, items[ i ].flagCount );
00334 
00335         case EIT_NAMEDFLAGLIST:
00337                 B_ASSERT( items[ i ].flagValues != 0 );
00338 
00339                 return BscParseNamedFlagList( value->flagValues, items[ i ].name, tokens, items[ i ].flagValues, items[ i ].flagCount );
00340 
00341         case EIT_NAMEDIDENTEXPR:
00343                 B_ASSERT( value->exprs == 0 );
00344                 B_ASSERT( value->idents == 0 );
00345 
00346                 value->exprs = new URef< UExprTerm >[ itemInfo->valueCount ];
00347                 value->exprCount = itemInfo->valueCount;
00348                 value->idents = new tstring[ 1 ];
00349                 value->identCount = 1;
00350 
00351                 return BscParseNamedIdentExpr( *value->idents, value->exprs, items[ i ].name, tokens, *arrayTable, *varTable );
00352 
00353         case EIT_NAMEDIDENTEXPRLIST:
00355                 B_ASSERT( value->exprs == 0 );
00356                 B_ASSERT( value->idents == 0 );
00357 
00358                 value->exprs = new URef< UExprTerm >[ itemInfo->valueCount ];
00359                 value->exprCount = itemInfo->valueCount;
00360                 value->idents = new tstring[ 1 ];
00361                 value->identCount = 1;
00362 
00363                 return BscParseNamedIdentExprList( *value->idents, value->exprs, itemInfo->valueCount, items[ i ].name,
00364                         tokens, *arrayTable, *varTable );
00365 
00366         case EIT_NAMEDPATH:
00368                 B_ASSERT( value->paths == 0 );
00369 
00370                 value->paths = new UPath[ itemInfo->valueCount ];
00371                 value->pathCount = itemInfo->valueCount;
00372 
00373                 return BscParseNamedPath( *value->paths, items[ i ].name, tokens );
00374 
00375         case EIT_NAMEDPATHLIST:
00377                 B_ASSERT( value->paths == 0 );
00378 
00379                 value->paths = new UPath[ itemInfo->valueCount ];
00380                 value->pathCount = itemInfo->valueCount;
00381 
00382                 return BscParseNamedPathList( value->paths, itemInfo->valueCount, items[ i ].name, tokens );
00383 
00384         case EIT_NAMEDIDENTPATH:
00386                 B_ASSERT( value->paths == 0 );
00387                 B_ASSERT( value->idents == 0 );
00388 
00389                 value->paths = new UPath[ itemInfo->valueCount ];
00390                 value->pathCount = itemInfo->valueCount;
00391                 value->idents = new tstring[ 1 ];
00392                 value->identCount = 1;
00393 
00394                 return BscParseNamedIdentPath( *value->idents, *value->paths, items[ i ].name, tokens );
00395 
00396         case EIT_NAMEDIDENTPATHFLAGLIST:
00398                 B_ASSERT( value->paths == 0 );
00399                 B_ASSERT( value->idents == 0 );
00400 
00401                 value->paths = new UPath[ itemInfo->valueCount ];
00402                 value->pathCount = itemInfo->valueCount;
00403                 value->idents = new tstring[ 1 ];
00404                 value->identCount = 1;
00405 
00406                 return BscParseNamedIdentPathFlagList( *value->idents, *value->paths, value->flagValues, items[ i ].name, tokens,
00407                         items[ i ].flagValues, items[ i ].flagCount );
00408 
00409         case EIT_NAMEDIDENTPATHLIST:
00411                 B_ASSERT( value->paths == 0 );
00412                 B_ASSERT( value->idents == 0 );
00413 
00414                 value->paths = new UPath[ itemInfo->valueCount ];
00415                 value->pathCount = itemInfo->valueCount;
00416                 value->idents = new tstring[ 1 ];
00417                 value->identCount = 1;
00418 
00419                 return BscParseNamedIdentPathList( *value->idents, value->paths, itemInfo->valueCount,
00420                         items[ i ].name, tokens );
00421 
00422         case EIT_NAMEDIDENTPATHLISTFLAGLIST:
00424                 B_ASSERT( value->paths == 0 );
00425                 B_ASSERT( value->idents == 0 );
00426 
00427                 value->paths = new UPath[ itemInfo->valueCount ];
00428                 value->pathCount = itemInfo->valueCount;
00429                 value->idents = new tstring[ 1 ];
00430                 value->identCount = 1;
00431 
00432                 return BscParseNamedIdentPathListFlagList( *value->idents, value->paths, itemInfo->valueCount,
00433                         value->flagValues, items[ i ].name, tokens, items[ i ].flagValues, items[ i ].flagCount );
00434 
00435         case EIT_NAMEDIDENTPAIR:
00437                 B_ASSERT( value->paths == 0 );
00438 
00439                 value->idents = new tstring[ 2 ];
00440                 value->identCount = 2;
00441 
00442                 return BscParseNamedIdentPair( value->idents[ 0 ], value->idents[ 1 ], items[ i ].name, tokens );
00443 
00444         case EIT_NAMEDSTRING:
00446                 B_ASSERT( value->strings == 0 );
00447 
00448                 value->strings = new tstring[ itemInfo->valueCount ];
00449                 value->stringCount = itemInfo->valueCount;
00450 
00451                 return BscParseNamedString( *value->strings, items[ i ].name, tokens );
00452 
00453         default:
00455                 B_ASSERT( false );
00456         }
00457         return 0;
00458 }

00465 //----------------------------------------------------------
00466 bool
00467 BscIsIdent( const SBscToken* tokens, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
00468 {
00469         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
00470 
00471         if ( tokens->tokenId == BL_IDENTIFIER )
00472         {
00473                 tokensRead = 1;
00474                 return true;
00475         }
00476         tokensRead = 0;
00477         return false;
00478 }
00479 
00480 //----------------------------------------------------------
00481 unsigned int
00482 BscParseIdent( tstring& ident, const SBscToken* tokens )
00483 {
00484         unsigned int tokensRead = 0;
00485         B_ASSERT( BscIsIdent( tokens ) );
00486 
00488         ident = tokens->text;
00489 
00491         return 1;
00492 }

00499 //----------------------------------------------------------
00500 bool
00501 BscIsPath( const SBscToken* tokens, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
00502 {
00503         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
00504 
00505         if ( tokens->tokenId != BL_IDENTIFIER && tokens->tokenId != BL_STRING &&
00506                 tokens->tokenId != BL_NUMBER )
00507         {
00508                 tokensRead = 0;
00509                 return false;
00510         }
00511         tokensRead = 1;
00512         return true;
00513 }
00514 
00515 //----------------------------------------------------------
00516 unsigned int
00517 BscParsePath( UPath& path, const SBscToken* tokens )
00518 {
00519         unsigned int tokensRead = 0;
00520         B_ASSERT( BscIsPath( tokens ) );
00521 
00523         path = tokens->text;
00524 
00526         return 1;
00527 }

00534 //----------------------------------------------------------
00535 bool
00536 BscIsNamedExpr( const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens, const BscArrayTable& arrayTable, 
00537                                 const BscVarTable& varTable, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
00538 {
00539         B_ASSERT( tokens != 0 );
00540 
00541         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
00542         tokensRead = 0;
00543         unsigned int subTokensRead = 0;
00544         if ( _stricmp( name, tokens[ 0 ].text.c_str() ) != 0 )
00545                 return false;
00546 
00547 //      ++tokensRead;
00548 //      if ( tokens[ 1 ].tokenId != BL_EQUALS )
00549 //              return false;
00550 
00551         ++tokensRead;
00552 
00553         bool isExpr = BscIsExpr( tokens + 1, arrayTable, varTable, &subTokensRead );
00554         tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00555 
00556         return isExpr;
00557 }
00558 
00559 //----------------------------------------------------------
00560 unsigned int
00561 BscParseNamedExpr( URef< UExprTerm >* expr, const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens,
00562                                    const BscArrayTable& arrayTable, const BscVarTable& varTable )
00563 {
00564         unsigned int tokensRead = 0;
00565         B_ASSERT( BscIsNamedExpr( name, tokens + tokensRead, arrayTable, varTable ) );
00566 
00568         tokensRead = 1;
00569         tokensRead += BscParseExpr( expr, tokens + tokensRead, arrayTable, varTable );
00570 
00571         return tokensRead;
00572 }
00573

00575 //**********************************************************
00577 //**********************************************************
00578 
00579 //----------------------------------------------------------
00580 unsigned int
00581 BscIsNamedExprList( const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens, const BscArrayTable& arrayTable,
00582                                         const BscVarTable& varTable, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
00583 {
00584         B_ASSERT( tokens != 0 );
00585 
00586         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
00587         unsigned int exprCount = 0;
00588 
00591         tokensRead = 1;
00592         if ( _stricmp( tokens[ 0 ].text.c_str(), name ) != 0 )
00593                 return 0;
00594 
00595 //      tokensRead = 2;
00596 //      if ( tokens[ 1 ].tokenId != BL_EQUALS )
00597 //              return 0;
00598 
00600         unsigned int subTokensRead = 0;
00601         do
00602         {
00604                 if ( !BscIsExpr( tokens + tokensRead, arrayTable, varTable, &subTokensRead ) )
00605                 {
00606                         tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00607                         return 0;
00608                 }
00609                 tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00610 
00612                 ++exprCount;
00613 
00614                 if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_COMMA )
00615                 {
00617                         ++tokensRead;
00618                 }
00619                 else
00620                 {
00622                         break;
00623                 }
00624         } while ( true );
00625 
00627         return exprCount;
00628 }
00629 
00630 //----------------------------------------------------------
00631 unsigned int
00632 BscParseNamedExprList( URef< UExprTerm >* exprs, unsigned int maxExprCount, const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens,
00633                                            const BscArrayTable& arrayTable, const BscVarTable& varTable )
00634 {
00636         B_ASSERT( exprs != 0 );
00637         B_ASSERT( maxExprCount == BscIsNamedExprList( name, tokens, arrayTable, varTable ) && maxExprCount > 0 );
00638 
00640         unsigned int tokensRead = 1;
00641         unsigned int exprIdx = 0;
00642 
00644         tokensRead += BscParseExpr( exprs + exprIdx, tokens + tokensRead, arrayTable, varTable );
00645         ++exprIdx;
00646 
00648         while ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_COMMA )
00649         {
00651                 ++tokensRead;
00652 
00654                 B_ASSERT( exprIdx < maxExprCount );
00655 
00656                 tokensRead += BscParseExpr( exprs + exprIdx, tokens + tokensRead, arrayTable, varTable );
00657                 ++exprIdx;
00658         }
00659 
00660         return tokensRead;
00661 }
00662

00664 //**********************************************************
00666 //**********************************************************
00667 
00668 //----------------------------------------------------------
00669 bool
00670 BscIsNamedFlag( const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens, const SFlagValue* flagValues,
00671                                 unsigned int flagValueCount, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
00672 {
00673         B_ASSERT( tokens != 0 );
00674 
00675         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
00676         tokensRead = 0;
00677         if ( _stricmp( tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str(), name ) != 0 )
00678                 return false;
00679         ++tokensRead;
00680 
00681         unsigned int flag = flagValueCount;
00682         while ( flag-- > 0 )
00683         {
00684                 B_ASSERT( flagValues[ flag ].str != 0 );
00685                 if ( _stricmp( tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str(), flagValues[ flag ].str ) == 0 )
00686                 {
00687                         ++tokensRead;
00688                         return true;
00689                 }
00690         }
00691 
00693         return false;
00694 }
00695 
00696 //----------------------------------------------------------
00697 unsigned int
00698 BscParseNamedFlag( unsigned int& value, const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens,
00699                                    const SFlagValue* flagValues, unsigned int flagValueCount )
00700 {
00702         B_ASSERT( BscIsNamedFlag( name, tokens, flagValues, flagValueCount ) );
00703 
00705         unsigned int tokensRead = 0;
00706 
00708         ++tokensRead;
00709         unsigned int flag = flagValueCount;
00710         while ( flag-- > 0 )
00711         {
00712                 if ( _stricmp( tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str(), flagValues[ flag ].str ) == 0 )
00713                 {
00714                         value = flagValues[ flag ].value;
00715                         return ++tokensRead;
00716                 }
00717         }
00718 
00720         B_ASSERT( false );
00721         return 0;
00722 }
00723 
00724 
00725 //**********************************************************
00727 //**********************************************************
00728 
00729 //----------------------------------------------------------
00730 bool
00731 BscIsNamedFlagList( const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens, const SFlagValue* flagValues,
00732                                          unsigned int flagValueCount, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
00733 {
00734         B_ASSERT( tokens != 0 );
00735 
00736         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
00737 
00738         tokensRead = 0;
00739         if ( _stricmp( tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str(), name ) != 0 )
00740                 return false;
00741         ++tokensRead;
00742 
00743         bool flagFound = false;
00744         unsigned int flag = 0;
00745         do
00746         {
00747                 flag = flagValueCount;
00748                 while ( flag-- > 0 )
00749                 {
00750                         B_ASSERT( flagValues[ flag ].str != 0 );
00751                         if ( _stricmp( tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str(), flagValues[ flag ].str ) == 0 )
00752                         {
00753                                 flagFound = true;
00754                                 ++tokensRead;
00755                                 break;
00756                         }
00757                 }
00758 
00759                 if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_COMMA )
00760                 {
00761                         break;
00762                 }
00763                 ++tokensRead;
00764         } while ( true );
00765 
00767         return flagFound;
00768 }

00771 unsigned int
00772 BscParseNamedFlagList( unsigned int& value, const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens,
00773                                            const SFlagValue* flagValues, unsigned int flagValueCount )
00774 {
00776         unsigned int tokensRead = 0;
00777         B_ASSERT( BscIsNamedFlagList( name, tokens, flagValues, flagValueCount ) );

00779         tokensRead = 1;

00785                 flag = flagValueCount;

00787                 {
00789                         if ( _stricmp( tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str(), flagValues[ flag ].str ) == 0 )
00790                         {

00792                                 ++tokensRead;
00793 
00795                                 break;
00796                         }
00797                 }
00798 
00800                 if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_COMMA )
00801                         break;
00802 
00803                 ++tokensRead;
00804         } while ( true );
00805 
00807         return tokensRead;

00817 BscIsNamedIdentExpr( const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens, const BscArrayTable& arrayTable,
00818                                          const BscVarTable& varTable, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
00819 {
00820         B_ASSERT( tokens != 0 );
00821 
00822         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
00823 
00824         if ( _stricmp( name, tokens[ 0 ].text.c_str() ) != 0 )
00825                 return false;
00826 
00827         tokensRead = 1;
00828         if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_IDENTIFIER )
00829                 return false;
00830 
00832         unsigned int subTokensRead = 0;
00833         bool isIdentExprList = BscIsNamedExpr( tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str(), tokens + tokensRead, arrayTable, varTable, &subTokensRead );
00834         tokensRead += subTokensRead;
00835 
00836         return isIdentExprList;
00837 }

00917 BscIsNamedPath( const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
00918 {
00919         B_ASSERT( tokens != 0 );
00920 
00921         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
00922 
00925         tokensRead = 0;
00926         if ( _stricmp( name, tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str() ) != 0 )
00927                 return false;

00929

00931 //              return false;
00932 //      ++tokensRead;
00933

00935                 tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_NUMBER )
00936                 return false;
00937         ++tokensRead;
00938 
00939         return true;
00940 }

01055 bool
01056 BscIsNamedIdentPathFlagList( const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens, const SFlagValue* flagValues, 
01057                                                          unsigned int flagValueCount, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
01058 {
01059         B_ASSERT( tokens != 0 );
01060 
01061         unsigned int subTokensRead = 0;
01062         bool isIdentPath = BscIsNamedIdentPath( name, tokens, &subTokensRead );
01063         if ( !isIdentPath )
01064                 return false;
01065 
01066         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
01067         tokensRead += subTokensRead;
01068 
01070         bool flagFound = false;
01071         unsigned int flag = 0;
01072         do
01073         {
01074 
01076                 flag = flagValueCount;
01077                 while ( flag-- > 0 )
01078                 {
01079                         B_ASSERT( flagValues[ flag ].str != 0 );
01080                         if ( _stricmp( tokens[ tokensRead ].text.c_str(), flagValues[ flag ].str ) == 0 )
01081                         {
01082                                 flagFound = true;
01083                                 ++tokensRead;
01084                                 break;
01085                         }
01086                 }
01087 
01090                 if ( flag == ( unsigned int )-1 && flagFound )
01091                 {
01092                         return false;
01093                 }
01094 
01096                 if ( !flagFound )
01097                         break;
01098 
01101                 if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_COMMA )
01102                         break;
01103 
01105                 ++tokensRead;
01106         } while ( true );
01107 
01108         return isIdentPath;
01109 }

01320 //----------------------------------------------------------
01321 unsigned int
01322 BscIsNamedPathList( const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
01323 {
01324         B_ASSERT( tokens != 0 );
01325 
01326         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
01327 
01330         tokensRead = 0;
01331         if ( _stricmp( name, tokens[ 0 ].text.c_str() ) != 0 )
01332                 return 0;
01333         ++tokensRead;
01334 
01335 //      if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_EQUALS )
01336 //              return 0;
01337 //      ++tokensRead;
01338 
01339         if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_IDENTIFIER && tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_STRING &&
01340                 tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_NUMBER )
01341                 return 0;
01342         ++tokensRead;
01343 
01345         unsigned int pathCount = 1;
01346 
01348         while ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_COMMA )
01349         {
01351                 ++tokensRead;
01352                 if ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_IDENTIFIER && tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_STRING &&
01353                         tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId != BL_NUMBER )
01354                 {
01355                         return 0;
01356                 }
01357 
01359                 ++tokensRead;
01360                 ++pathCount;
01361         }
01362 
01363         return pathCount;
01364 }

01366 //----------------------------------------------------------
01367 unsigned int
01368 BscParseNamedPathList( UPath* path, unsigned int maxPathCount, const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens )
01369 {
01370         B_ASSERT( path != 0 );
01371 
01373         unsigned int tokensRead = 0;
01374         B_ASSERT( maxPathCount == BscIsNamedPathList( name, tokens ) && maxPathCount > 0 );
01375 
01377         tokensRead = 2;
01378         unsigned int pathIndex = 0;
01379         path[ pathIndex++ ] = tokens[ 1 ].text;
01380         while ( tokens[ tokensRead ].tokenId == BL_COMMA )
01381         {
01382                 ++tokensRead;
01383                 path[ pathIndex++ ] = tokens[ tokensRead++ ].text;
01384         }
01385 
01386         return tokensRead;
01387 }

01393 //----------------------------------------------------------
01394 bool
01395 BscIsNamedString( const char* name, const SBscToken* tokens, unsigned int* tokensReadOut )
01396 {
01397         SafeOffset tokensRead( tokensReadOut );
01398 
01401         tokensRead = 0;
01402         if ( _stricmp( name, tokens[ 0 ].text.c_str() ) != 0 )
01403                 return false;
01404         ++tokensRead;
01405 
01406         if ( tokens[ 1 ].tokenId != BL_EQUALS )
01407                 return false;
01408         ++tokensRead;
01409 
01410         if ( tokens[ 2 ].tokenId != BL_IDENTIFIER && tokens[ 2 ].tokenId != BL_STRING &&
01411                 tokens[ 2 ].tokenId != BL_NUMBER )
01412                 return false;
01413         ++tokensRead;
01414 
01415         return true;
01416 }

01424         B_ASSERT( BscIsNamedString( name, tokens ) );
